languages.text: {n}Дознаватель сжимает кулаки.{/n} "Вижу, приспешник ксеносов получил достойную награду за свое предательство. Я испытывал толику надежды, что мне все же посчастливится убить тебя самому... но теперь я не буду этого делать. Нет, ни в коей мере. Прозябание в этой... форме... и лишение света Его — куда большее наказание, чем я мог бы когда-нибудь измыслить". {n}Хейнрикс с отвращением плюет под ноги.{/n} "Будь ты проклят, Ахиллеас. Будь. Ты. Проклят".

{n}Heinrix clenches his fists.{/n} "I see the xenos' minion has been handsomely rewarded for his treachery. I had a sliver of hope that I might still be lucky enough to kill you myself... but I will not do so now. No, not by any means. To languish in this... form... and be deprived of His light is a far greater punishment than any I could devise." {n}Heinrix spits on the ground in disgust.{/n} "Damn you, Achilleas. Damn. You."

Проклят".

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは両の拳をぐっと握りしめる。{/n}「異種族の手先は裏切りの報酬を存分に受けとったのでしょう。我にはごくわずかな希望がありました。陛下を我が手で殺せるだけの運があるかもしれないと…ですが、もうその気は失せました。絶対に、そんなことはしません。こんな姿に…苦しみ…神帝陛下の光を奪われるとは、我が考え得るどんな罰よりもはるかに重い」{n}ハインリックスは忌々しそうにつばを床に吐く。{/n}「くそっ、アキレアス。畜生め。お前というやつは…」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clenches his fists.{/n} "I see the xenos' minion has been handsomely rewarded for his treachery. I had a sliver of hope that I might still be lucky enough to kill you myself... but I will not do so now. No, not by any means. To languish in this... form... and be deprived of His light is a far greater punishment than any I could devise." {n}Heinrix spits on the ground in disgust.{/n} "Damn you, Achilleas. Damn. You."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは両の拳をぐっと握りしめる。{/n}「異種族の手先は裏切りの報酬を存分に受けとったのでしょう。我にはごくわずかな希望がありました。陛下を我が手で殺せるだけの運があるかもしれないと…ですが、もうその気は失せました。絶対に、そんなことはしません。こんな姿に…苦しみ…神帝陛下の光を奪われるとは、我が考え得るどんな罰よりもはるかに重い」{n}ハインリックスは忌々しそうにつばを床に吐く。{/n}「くそっ、アキレアス。畜生め。お前というやつは…」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希捏紧了拳头。{/n}“我看到了，异形的爪牙由于背叛了人类，获得了丰厚的回报。我本还抱有一丝希望，以为我或许有幸能亲手杀了你……可我改变主意了。不，我绝不会动手杀你。以你现在的这种……样子……失去神皇的庇护，受尽折磨地死去，才是我从未想象过的、最严厉的惩罚。”{n}海因里希厌恶地朝地上啐了一口。{/n}“你真该死，阿吉里亚斯。你，真，该，死。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clenches his fists.{/n} "I see the xenos' minion has been handsomely rewarded for his treachery. I had a sliver of hope that I might still be lucky enough to kill you myself... but I will not do so now. No, not by any means. To languish in this... form... and be deprived of His light is a far greater punishment than any I could devise." {n}Heinrix spits on the ground in disgust.{/n} "Damn you, Achilleas. Damn. You."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希捏紧了拳头。{/n}“我看到了，异形的爪牙由于背叛了人类，获得了丰厚的回报。我本还抱有一丝希望，以为我或许有幸能亲手杀了你……可我改变主意了。不，我绝不会动手杀你。以你现在的这种……样子……失去神皇的庇护，受尽折磨地死去，才是我从未想象过的、最严厉的惩罚。”{n}海因里希厌恶地朝地上啐了一口。{/n}“你真该死，阿吉里亚斯。你，真，该，死。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix serre les poings.{/n} « Je vois que le sbire du xénos a été généreusement récompensé pour sa trahison. J'avais le faible espoir d'avoir la chance de vous tuer moi-même... mais j'y renonce. Je ne lèverai pas la main sur vous. Vous voir languir sous cette... forme... et privé de Sa lumière est une punition bien plus cruelle que tout ce que je pourrais imaginer. {n}Heinrix crache de dégoût.{/n} Soyez maudit, Achilleas. Soyez... maudit ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clenches his fists.{/n} "I see the xenos' minion has been handsomely rewarded for his treachery. I had a sliver of hope that I might still be lucky enough to kill you myself... but I will not do so now. No, not by any means. To languish in this... form... and be deprived of His light is a far greater punishment than any I could devise." {n}Heinrix spits on the ground in disgust.{/n} "Damn you, Achilleas. Damn. You."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix serre les poings.{/n} « Je vois que le sbire du xénos a été généreusement récompensé pour sa trahison. J'avais le faible espoir d'avoir la chance de vous tuer moi-même... mais j'y renonce. Je ne lèverai pas la main sur vous. Vous voir languir sous cette... forme... et privé de Sa lumière est une punition bien plus cruelle que tout ce que je pourrais imaginer. {n}Heinrix crache de dégoût.{/n} Soyez maudit, Achilleas. Soyez... maudit ! »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix aprieta los puños.{/n} «Veo que el esbirro de los xenos ha salido recompensado con creces por su traición. Albergaba la mínima esperanza de que aún tuviera la suerte de matarte yo mismo... pero ahora veo que no. No, ni en sueños. Languidecer en esta... forma... y verme privado de su luz es un castigo mucho mayor que cualquiera que se me pudiera ocurrir». {n}Heinrix escupe al suelo con desagrado.{/n} «Maldito seas, Achilleas. Maldito. Seas».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clenches his fists.{/n} "I see the xenos' minion has been handsomely rewarded for his treachery. I had a sliver of hope that I might still be lucky enough to kill you myself... but I will not do so now. No, not by any means. To languish in this... form... and be deprived of His light is a far greater punishment than any I could devise." {n}Heinrix spits on the ground in disgust.{/n} "Damn you, Achilleas. Damn. You."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix aprieta los puños.{/n} «Veo que el esbirro de los xenos ha salido recompensado con creces por su traición. Albergaba la mínima esperanza de que aún tuviera la suerte de matarte yo mismo... pero ahora veo que no. No, ni en sueños. Languidecer en esta... forma... y verme privado de su luz es un castigo mucho mayor que cualquiera que se me pudiera ocurrir». {n}Heinrix escupe al suelo con desagrado.{/n} «Maldito seas, Achilleas. Maldito. Seas».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix ballt die Fäuste.{/n} "Wie ich sehe, wurde der Scherge der Xenos für seinen Verrat großzügig belohnt. Ich hatte einen Funken Hoffnung, dass ich das Glück haben könnte, Euch selbst zu töten ... aber das werde ich nicht. Nein, um keinen Preis. In dieser ... Gestalt ... zu schmachten und Seines Lichtes beraubt zu sein, ist eine weit härtere Strafe als alles, was ich Euch antun könnte." {n}Heinrix spuckt angewidert auf den Boden.{/n} "Seid verflucht, Achilleas. Seid. Verflucht."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clenches his fists.{/n} "I see the xenos' minion has been handsomely rewarded for his treachery. I had a sliver of hope that I might still be lucky enough to kill you myself... but I will not do so now. No, not by any means. To languish in this... form... and be deprived of His light is a far greater punishment than any I could devise." {n}Heinrix spits on the ground in disgust.{/n} "Damn you, Achilleas. Damn. You."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix ballt die Fäuste.{/n} "Wie ich sehe, wurde der Scherge der Xenos für seinen Verrat großzügig belohnt. Ich hatte einen Funken Hoffnung, dass ich das Glück haben könnte, Euch selbst zu töten ... aber das werde ich nicht. Nein, um keinen Preis. In dieser ... Gestalt ... zu schmachten und Seines Lichtes beraubt zu sein, ist eine weit härtere Strafe als alles, was ich Euch antun könnte." {n}Heinrix spuckt angewidert auf den Boden.{/n} "Seid verflucht, Achilleas. Seid. Verflucht."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, yumruklarını sıkıyor.{/n} "Görüyorum da zeno yardakçısı, ihaneti karşılığında cömertçe ödüllendirilmiş. Seni öldürme fırsatım olacağını umuyordum ancak... Öldürmekten vazgeçtim. Kesinlikle olmaz. Bu... Biçimde... Sürünmen ve İmparator'un nurundan mahrum kalman, sana verebileceğim tüm cezalardan daha ağır." {n}Heinrix, iğrenerek yere tükürüyor.{/n} "Lanet olsun sana Achilleas. Lanet. Olsun. Sana."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clenches his fists.{/n} "I see the xenos' minion has been handsomely rewarded for his treachery. I had a sliver of hope that I might still be lucky enough to kill you myself... but I will not do so now. No, not by any means. To languish in this... form... and be deprived of His light is a far greater punishment than any I could devise." {n}Heinrix spits on the ground in disgust.{/n} "Damn you, Achilleas. Damn. You."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, yumruklarını sıkıyor.{/n} "Görüyorum da zeno yardakçısı, ihaneti karşılığında cömertçe ödüllendirilmiş. Seni öldürecek kadar şansımın yaver gitmesine dair bir nebze de olsa umudum vardı ancak... Öldürmekten vazgeçtim. Kesinlikle olmaz. Bu... Biçimde... Sürünmen ve İmparator'un nurundan mahrum kalman, sana verebileceğim tüm cezalardan daha ağır." {n}Heinrix, iğrenerek yere tükürüyor.{/n} "Lanet olsun sana Achilleas. Lanet. Olsun. Sana."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
